resources.string: © 2016 Dadi Zhang \r\nMade with love in Waterloo and Ottawa
Are you learning a new language? If so, are you struggling with the numbers?
You have selected %1$s as your language of choice. Are you sure?
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
This app will make you an expert in recognizing numbers in the language you are learning!
Phone numbers, dates, special cases...Big numbers are problematic even to native speakers.
Start with the level you are most comfortable with and go from there. You got this!
Just relax and listen to the numbers!
